title: US announces $14.5m for offshore wind environmental research
lead: It will support research efforts to increase understanding of the environmental impacts of offshore wind, as well as projects that advance and validate tools to monitor and minimise impacts

title: Spanish utility Naturgy to invest $1.8bn to enter the US renewable energy market
lead: The company aims to reach an operational solar capacity of 1.6GW by 2025

title: COP26 President: ‘2021 will be a very big year for climate and the UK’
lead: Speaking at the Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy Committee earlier today, Alok Sharma said he wants COP26 to be the most inclusive COP ever

title: Scientists in Ireland to build a pedestrian bridge made from old wind turbine blades
lead: The project aims to minimise and repurpose wind turbine blade waste

title: Hyundai to manufacture fuel cells systems in China
lead: It will be the company’s first fuel cell production base outside Korea, manufacturing the same proven fuel cell systems used for its NEXO fuel cell electric SUV

title: France’s Total buys 20% stake in Adani Green Energy
lead: Total will also have a seat on the board of directors of the company

title: MIT designs hybrid-electric jet that ‘could fly with 95% less NOx emissions’
lead: The aircraft uses technology which claims to ‘clean’ exhaust gases during flight

title: Octopus Energy launches ‘world’s first’ tariff offering 50% discount when wind is blowing
lead: The ‘Fan Club’ tariff could save consumers more than £200 per year

title: US natural gas and oil production to fall in 2021
lead: That would be a result of a decline in drilling activity related to low oil prices, with responses to the COVID-19 pandemic also leading to supply and demand disruptions

title: Oil discovery in Egypt’s Western Desert
lead: Independent producer Apex said the well in Cretaceous sandstones can produce 2,000 barrels a day
